name: Cu Chi Tunnels Explorer by bike
description:
Visit the infamous Cu Chi tunnels. These historical
remnants of war were used by the Viet Cong during the Vietnam War. You will
have a chance to sample what conditions would have been like hidden down those
small tunnels. As you are on two wheels you will be able to further explore the
area in more detail, passing by small villages and lush rice fields as well as
learning about some of the cottage industries thriving nearby. A great ride out
to sample local life surrounding the Mekong.
